question: Dream About iblis.
answer:
QUESTION
I had a dream.That I was sitting in a small white room.I sat in a chair and a man sat on the sofa on the corner to me. It was iblis in a mans body.He kept saying how he is not a bad person. And i almost beleaved him .but than something happened like he fell in a hole. And he had one arm trying to pull me in. And i hit him with my fist into his arm and it was like a rock.And than i hit him saying Allah Akbar and it hurt him so he let me go..can you please tell me what this dream meens.
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

Allah Ta'ala says, 'Man is created weak.' (An-Nisaa), thus Shaytaan tried to pull you in the hole.

In another verse, He says, 'The tricks of the Shaytaan are weak.'
(An-Nisaa), man can become strong against Shaytaan by fulfilling the orders
of Allah Ta'ala, (thus, by saying Allaah Akbar, you hurt Shaytaan).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
